summary:
- Developed pipeline for GPU inference optimization of deep neural networks, using NVIDIA TensorRT in C++
 - Implemented custom CUDA kernels for accelerated decoding of semantic segmentation, depth, optical flow estimations
 - Trained deep segmentation and depth networks for real time deployment on autonomous vehicles, using Pytorch

- Built demo for security facial recognition and pedestrian detection, using Dlib and OpenCV
 - Developed preliminary software architecture of robot, navigating user-defined patrolling routes, in ROS (C++, Python)

company: Singapore University of Technology and Design
summary:
- Designed and fabricated variable stiffness mechanisms with high stiffness bandwidth and low energy consumption
 - Fabricated custom PCBs for high precision motor position control, orientation encoding and power monitoring
